content: the wrap and purl it together with the wrapped stitch turn -­ continue unwrapping each stitch in this manner one at a time until all stitches have been worked stitch count will be restored to 24 28 32 stitches leg -­ resume working in the round knit to 1 stitch before the held leg stitches pick up a stitch in the space between the heel and the leg and knit it together with the last stitch of the heel this will close the gap between heel and leg knit to 1 stitch before the end of the row pick up a stitch in the space between the leg and the heel and knit it together with the last stitch of the leg 24 28 32 stitches -­ work 10 row in stockinette stitch or desired leg length cuff -­ work 5 row in knit 1 purl 1 ribbing -­ bind off in jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off finishing -­ weave in all ends invisibly with tapestry needle can be blocked if desired
